name: LaserBot
description:
There’s no turning back now!

PRANK A JERK - AUGMENTED REALITY
Prank a jerk and get away with it for a change. Use augmented reality graffiti anywhere, anytime.

TELL YOUR FRIENDS. VOTE ON FACEBOOK!
Share your story. Join chat rooms with friends on Facebook, vote for a winner, or even try to make it to the top of the leaderboard.

TRY TO ESCAPE - AR SCI-FI GAMES
Now you’re hittin’ it! Make your own rules. Nobody bosses you here. High-definition AR game bots respond to your movements. Roam wild and free in augmented reality. Watch out for incoming fire!

BREAK THE RULES - LEAVE CLUES
Game rules were made to be broken - by you! React to your environment. Share messages and graffiti with other players - in your own style.

GET REVENGE - DEPLOY SPACE FORCE
Catch supplies, toss them into your ship, and you are ready to roll.

*Designed with your feedback. Thanks everybody!*
